persichetti.fundamentals.time module

time.py

Philosophical and computational model of musical time based on the Persichetti and Python Project. Supports absolute clock time, local musical inertial frames, tempo functions, and computation of the Fundamental Quantum of Musical Time (FQMT).

class persichetti.fundamentals.time.ClockDuration(seconds)[source]

Bases: object

Represents a duration or interval between two points in ClockTime.

seconds

Duration in seconds.

Type:

Decimal

class persichetti.fundamentals.time.ClockTime(seconds)[source]

Bases: object

Represents an absolute point in physical (Clock) time.

seconds

The time value in seconds.

Type:

Decimal

class persichetti.fundamentals.time.FQMTResolver[source]

Bases: object

Computes the Fundamental Quantum of Musical Time (FQMT) for a set of Musical Inertial Frames.

frames

List of smallest unit durations (in seconds) per MIF.

Type:

list of Fraction

add_frame(mif, smallest_unit_in_beats)[source]

Adds a frame with its smallest pulse unit.

compute_fqmt()[source]

Computes the least common multiple of all unit durations.

add_frame(mif: MusicalInertialFrame, smallest_unit_in_beats: Fraction)[source]

Adds a musical frame and its smallest unit (in beats).

Parameters:

  • mif (MusicalInertialFrame) – The frame to include.

  • smallest_unit_in_beats (Fraction) – The smallest unit of meter in beats (e.g., 1/8).

compute_fqmt()[source]

Computes the Fundamental Quantum of Musical Time (FQMT) in seconds as a Fraction.

Returns:

The smallest quantum of time that resolves all metrical frames.

Return type:

Fraction

class persichetti.fundamentals.time.TimeMapping(fqmt: Fraction, seconds_per_fqmt)[source]

Bases: object

Maps the Fundamental Quantum of Musical Time (FQMT) to real ClockTime.

fqmt

The quantum unit in musical time (e.g., 1/144 of a whole note).

Type:

Fraction

seconds_per_fqmt

Duration of one FQMT in seconds or a time-varying function.

Type:

Decimal or callable

musical_to_clock(tick_index)[source]

Converts a tick index to absolute ClockTime.

set_tempo(bpm_for_unit)[source]

Sets a fixed metronomic speed for the FQMT.

musical_to_clock(tick_index: int) → ClockTime[source]

Maps a musical tick (multiple of FQMT) to absolute ClockTime.

Parameters:

tick_index (int) – The index of the musical quantum.

Returns:

The mapped ClockTime.

Return type:

ClockTime

set_tempo(bpm_for_unit: Fraction)[source]

Set the duration of each FQMT unit based on a desired tempo.

Parameters:

bpm_for_unit (Fraction) – The number of FQMTs per minute.
